Hi all, so we can either write HTML directly into the a template ( as seen below) or reference a module which content gets placed in that space. is there a method that HubSpot prefers over the other? One that might be more beneficial than the other?
Andreas - I guess this depends on how you’re building your template. If you’re aiming to make it as “modular” and reusable as possible, I (personally) would go for a module.
I actually build each module in isolation, then use bootstrap/dnd_module as the “glue” to bring them together structurally.
